FuncDef: The display pnp state command displays the plug-and-play (PNP) or ZTP status of a device.
Examples: The device is on PNP state.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check whether a device works in the PNP state or ZTP state, run the display pnp state command.If the device works in the PNP state or ZTP state, a message is displayed. If the device does not work in the PNP state, no message is displayed.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
